title: PQC REST microservice: ML-DSA-44 and ML-KEM-512
description:
## Features 

 This is a testbed to experiment with PQC. The REST APIs are powered by [Zenroom](https://zenroom.org), the same code runs on mobile, and in the browser. The microservices can be extended in Zencode, see the playground [Apiroom](https://apiroom.net). This instance offers: 

  - ML-DSA-44: secret and public key generation, signature, verification 

 - ML-KEM-512 + AES-GCM: secret and public key generation, create ciphertext, encrypt a payload using AES-GCM (and the ciphertext), decrypt the ciphertext and the decrypt the AES-GCM 

 ## Setup create keys, print them, disable the creation 

 - Genrate your own secret and public keys by clicking on *Setup: create and print secret/public keys > /create-keys*, the keys are stored in *../contracts/keys/keyring.keys.json* 

 - after generating your keys, if you want to disable the keygen, rename the file *../contracts/create-keys.zen* to *create-keys.off*, you can re-enable it by renaming it anytime 

 - Print your public keys, *Setup: create and print secret/public keys > /print-pubkeys* 

 ## REST APIs 

 ### ML-DSA-44 

 Click on *ML-DSA-44* and then click on *sign* to create a signature and *verify* to verify it. 

 ### ML-KEM-512 

 Click on *ML-KEM-512* and then on *encrypt* to encrypt a string and *decrypt* to decrypt it. 

 ## Zencode Applets 

 Click on *Applets*, then on any on the links in the sub-menu, and on   ***ðŸ‘‰ Click here to open the applet***   inside the page, to open an auto-generated GUI, offering the same functionality of the corresponding API. 

 ## Tech stack, repos and playground 

 - Cryptography provided by [Zenroom](https://zenroom.org) and [Slangroom](https://dyne.org/slangroom/) and implemented in [Zencode](https://dev.zenroom.org/#/pages/zencode-intro?id=smart-contracts-in-human-language) 

 - REST APIs and Applets provided by [noË‘codeË‘room](https://github.com/ForkbombEu/ncr) 

 - This instance was generated using: [tf-ncr](https://github.com/forkbombeu/tf-ncr) and [tf-pqcrypto-scripts](https://github.com/forkbombeu/tf-pqcrypto-scripts) 

 - Zenroom's online playground [Apiroom](https://apiroom.net) 

 - Our other PQC appplications: [PQSpread](https://forkbombeu.github.io/pqspread), PQC-ready W3C-DID [method](https://dyne.org/W3C-DID/#mldsa44verificationkey), [service](https://did.dyne.org/dids/did:dyne:sandbox.genericissuer:7s4Qq2qE4PGi6oYRBGFTrhh9fbhGvG6AUdmirJ1C1Tzz) and [explorer](https://explorer.did.dyne.org/details/did:dyne:sandbox.genericissuer:7s4Qq2qE4PGi6oYRBGFTrhh9fbhGvG6AUdmirJ1C1Tzz), PQC-ready SSI Solution [DIDroom](https://didroom.com)
